whitelistUpdates.title: Version 2.1 Release
whitelistUpdates.description: Released with Improved Plan Mode, AI Code Review in Editor, and Instant Grep features

whitelistUpdates.title: Series D Funding and Revenue Milestone
whitelistUpdates.description: Raised $2.3B in Series D funding and passed $1B in annualized revenue

whitelistUpdates.title: Enterprise Productivity Impact Study
whitelistUpdates.description: Research shows companies merge 39% more PRs after Cursor's agent became the default

whitelistUpdates.title: Continue Cloud Agents
whitelistUpdates.description: Continue Cloud Agents increase developer productivity by automating 'frog' work, creating review-ready output for faster shipping

insights.title: How we're making GitHub Copilot smarter with fewer tools
insights.description: GitHub introduces embedding-guided tool routing and adaptive clustering techniques to make Copilot more efficient while using fewer computational resources. Focuses on improving AI coding assistant performance through better tool selection and routing algorithms.
insights.author: GitHub Engineering Team

insights.title: How to write a great agents.md: Lessons from over 2,500 repositories
insights.description: Analysis of over 2,500 repositories provides practical tips for configuring GitHub Copilot and AI agents. Offers best practices for agent configuration, documentation, and optimization based on real-world usage patterns.
insights.author: GitHub Engineering Team

insights.title: Fara-7B: Efficient Agentic Model for Computer Use
insights.description: Discussion on Hacker News about Fara-7B, a new efficient agentic AI model designed for computer use and automation. Highlights the trend toward smaller, more efficient models capable of handling complex tasks.
insights.author: Hacker News Community

insights.title: Gemini CLI Tips for Agentic Coding
insights.description: Hacker News discussion focusing on practical tips and techniques for using Google's Gemini CLI for agentic coding workflows. Covers command-line integration and AI-assisted development patterns.
insights.author: Hacker News Community

insights.title: Spec-driven development with AI
insights.description: Introduction to an open source toolkit that combines AI tools with specification-driven development workflows. Aims to bridge the gap between technical specifications and AI-assisted code generation.
insights.author: GitHub Engineering Team

insights.title: Recent AI Model Developments and Security Concerns
insights.description: Coverage of new AI model releases including Claude Opus 4.5, Gemini 3 Pro, and GPT-5.1, alongside discussions of security vulnerabilities in AI systems like Google Antigravity and prompt injection risks.
insights.author: Simon Willison

insights.title: EU Regulatory Impact on Technology Standards
insights.description: Analysis of how EU regulations are influencing technology adoption, specifically Apple's implementation of new Wi-Fi standards that benefit Android compatibility. Highlights the broader impact of regulation on AI and tech development.
insights.author: Hacker News Community
